ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: A. Poncelet and E. Stempinski ably assisted in the field. We thank K. Kusnerik for collecting many of the samples, and P. Monarrez, B. Howes, S. Dominici and G. Price for helpful discussions. We also thank Palaeontology reviewers Wolfgang Kiessling, Sally Thomas and an anonymous reviewer for their perceptive comments and advice. Financial support was provided by a Marie Curie International Outgoing Fellowships for Career Development grant (PIOF‐GA‐2013‐624040).
